title: SOLD:  T206 Piedmont 350 Pryor McElveen PSA 3.5

posts.post_title: SOLD:  T206 Piedmont 350 Pryor McElveen PSA 3.5
posts.post_content:
Hi everyone.

I recently upgraded my McElveen and am looking to unload the old card.  It's a PSA 3.5. $SOLD.  I'll accept Paypal gift, check, or money order.  Please respond via email or PM. Thanks for looking.
